product.name: Wall Mount Mirror for Bathroom, Brushed Black Metal Framed Rounded Corner Rectangular Vanity Mirror (24" x 36", Black)
product.description:
Suitable for Bathroom, Living Room, Bedroom, Dressing Room, Cloakroom, Entryway, Farmhouse, Hallway, Dining Room, Vanity room, Hotel.
Minuover is a direct-sale factory with many years of professional manufacturing experience in the mirror industry. We focus on minimalist and stylish designs, elegant and fashionable, meeting various house style. The goal is to provide customers with perfect mirrors. And simple design corresponds to the simple life of ordinary people, ordinary without losing fun, Simple yet elegant, which is why we love what we do.
What should I do if the mirror I receive is broken or defective, or even the size or color is incorrect?
There is no need to return it if the mirror is damaged or defective. You can directly send photos of the damaged or defective mirror to our team, and you will receive an additional free mirror at no additional cost. Save you time and costs.
What's the material of the frame? What is the thickness of the metal frame? What is the depth of the frame?
Our bathroom mirrors are all made of high-quality aluminum alloy, not plastic material. No rust in dry or wet environments. The thickness of the mirror frame is 1 inch and the depth is 0.4 inches.
Can the mirror only be mounted on the wall?
No, you can also lean the rounded corner mirror against the wall, especially against the bedroom makeup table, or as a decorative mirror against the fireplace.
Will mirrors distort when reflected?
No, our bathroom vanity mirror is designed with HD glass to deliver a clear reflection with no distortion.
Black Round Corner Mirror
Arch Mirror
Pivot Mirror
Mantel Mirror
Round Mirror
Rectangular Mirror
Oval Mirror
product.bullet_points:
• Excellent Design: Our this bathroom wall mirror is designed with a kind of fashion and modern industrial style. The frame is made of brushed matte black metal with an angled design to protect the mirror. Besides, the black mirror is anti-stripping, anti-cracking and anti-water,and it is safer and more premium than traditional recessed frames
• High-quality material: With premium glass, the mirror is anti-distortion, which is perfect in reflection. The well-designed packaging ensures that the rounded corner mirror is delivered safely
• Useable areas and purpose: this wall-mounted mirror can be used in bathroom, bedroom, living room, etc. It can be used as a vanity mirror or decorative mirror to decorate your room and you can give yourself the last look through the rectangle mirror before going out. And with a modern industrial design, it is also suitable in various hotel rooms
• Easy to install: The backboard of the mirror is designed by new technics, which makes it lighter. It can be installed easily and safely in both horizontal and vertical orientations. There is installation instructions on the back of mirrors and we also provide wall anchors and screws for your installation
• Service: As a direct-sale factory with many years of professional manufacturing experience in the mirror industry, we aim to provide customers with perfect mirrors. We believe that this mirror can bring convenience and happiness to your daily life. And we are ready to serve you at any time
